Definition: Given reviews from Amazon, your task is to classify those reviews into two classes: Negative or Positive. Negative means the review has content that speaks negatively of the product. Positive means the review has content that speaks positively of the product.

Positive Examples.input: I've read this book with much expectation, it was very boring all through out the book
Positive Examples.explanation: Review writer does not like the book because it was boring, therefore it is a negative review.

Positive Examples.input: I believe I will be very happy with the camcorder. Its small,light and easy to handle.The LCD is clear and bright.Ease of operation.
Positive Examples.explanation: There are positive words in the review like "very happy", "easy to handle", therefore it is a positive review.

Positive Examples.input: love it...very touch.it's to bad that in the dvd description doesn't mention no subtitles
Positive Examples.explanation: There are positive words in the review like "love it", "very touch", therefore it is classified as positive review. Pay attention that although the reviewer is not happy that it's not mentioned that there are no subtitles, the overall polarity of the review is positive.

Negative Examples.input: It starts off a bit slow, but once the product placement jokes start it takes off.
Negative Examples.explanation: This review is positive review since it says that after product placement joke it becomes interesting.

Negative Examples.input: As good as this book may be, the print quality is so bad that I cannot read it. Zero stars would have been more appropriate.
Negative Examples.explanation: This is a negative review. because the print quality of book is very bad and not readable.

Negative Examples.input: I love it, it's LONG and the connection is secure and it doesn't get hot! It's wonderful!
Negative Examples.explanation: This is a positive review because it says "I love it" and "It's wonderful".

Instances.input: I'm glad I didn't go out and buy this movie. Thankfully, I just rented it. It starts out moving very slow, which some movies do. However, this movie never "gets going". The plot does not flow well, the actors lines don't always fit in to the scene, the background music does nothing for the movie, & there is a love side story thrown in for good measure. The computer animation of the air battles is the only good thing about this movie. My wife & I both watched it together. We both did not enjoy it. While watching the movie I actually thought about just ending the movie early. My advice, rent it before you buy it!If you want to see good WWI movies, then watch: The Blue Max, Paths Of Glory, The Lost Battalion
